mention.text: lima , 29 mar 89 -- the tupac amaru revolutionary movement , a peruvian guerrilla organization
the same day cardinal landazuri stated over a local television station that the church would be willing to mediate with violence-oriented movements under acceptable conditions for dialogue
president of the peruvian episcopal conference
